description: Full of flavour, dukkah-crusted salmon fillets served with greens tossed in lemon butter makes an easy summer dinner.
name: Dukkah-crusted Salmon With Greens And Lemon Butter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.3333 cup lemon & herb dukkah with almonds

recipeInstructions.text: Place salmon on a plate and rub with oil. Coat the top side of each fillet with dukkah.
Heat a greased barbecue plate on medium heat. Cook salmon for 3 minutes on each side or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a large plate. Cover to keep warm.
Meanwhile, combine butter, garlic and lemon zest in a small bowl. Season with pepper.

Add greens to the barbecue plate. Cook, turning occasionally, for 3-4 minutes or until bright green and tender. Place greens in a serving pan and dollop with butter mixture. Arrange salmon on top. Serve with lemon wedges.
